executive_summary.overview: Germany's economy demonstrated resilience amid global uncertainties, with steady growth and strong fundamentals.

vocational_training.description: Germany's dual education system combines classroom learning with practical work experience

policy_recommendations.recommendation: Accelerate digitalization across all sectors, particularly in public administration and SMEs
Invest in renewable energy infrastructure and grid modernization to achieve carbon neutrality goals
Strengthen STEM education and promote digital literacy at all educational levels
Implement policies to address aging population challenges and attract skilled immigration
Increase R&D investment and support startup ecosystem development

outlook.short_term: Moderate growth expected with gradual recovery from energy crisis impacts
outlook.medium_term: Structural reforms needed to maintain competitiveness in global markets
outlook.long_term: Demographic transition will require significant policy adjustments
